reason: move through 90 degrees to the right
command: Turning at the halt, RIGHT - TURN

squads.command: Turning by numbers, RIGHT TURN - ONE
squads.immediately: I forced my body through 90 degrees to the right by pivoting on the heel of my right foot and the ball of my left
squads.points: right foot is flat on the floor, right heel is slightly raised. The rest of the body is erect AND square to the front

squads.immediately: I brought my left leg up in front of me until my thigh was parallel with the ground with my foot hanging naturally from the knee. I then forced my left foot in next to my right foot
squads.points: I have returned to the correct position of attention
